mapper.select: SELECT distinct proj_idx, proj_id, proj_mem_id, proj_title, proj_recruit_num, proj_state, proj_recruit_num, proj_sort, proj_nation, proj_supply_type, date_format(proj_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_reg_date, proj_hit, date_format(proj_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_end_date, TO_DAYS(proj_end_date)-TO_DAYS(now()) as proj_Day, proj_profit, proj_profit_chk_date, proj_channel, profile_biz_certi, mem_nick, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ApplyList WHERE apply_proj_id = p.Proj_id) as apply_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectList WHERE Proj_mem_id = Profile_mem_id and proj_state = 1) as proj_add_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ApplyList WHERE Apply_mem_id = Profile_mem_id and apply_proj_state = 4) as okey_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ApplyList WHERE Apply_mem_id = Profile_mem_id and apply_proj_state = 5) as contract_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ApplyList WHERE Apply_mem_id = Profile_mem_id and apply_proj_state = 2) as my_apply_count FROM ProjectList p, IndusList i, MemList m, ProfileList pf WHERE 1=1 AND p.proj_indus = i.indus_id AND p.proj_mem_id = m.mem_id AND p.proj_mem_id = pf.profile_mem_id AND p.proj_mem_id = #{projMemId}

SELECT distinct proj_idx, proj_id, date_format(proj_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_reg_date, proj_title, date_format(proj_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as proj_end_date, proj_recruit_num, proj_state, proj_sort, proj_nation, proj_supply_type, proj_hit, TO_DAYS(proj_end_date)-TO_DAYS(now()) as proj_Day, proj_channel, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ApplyList WHERE apply_proj_id = p.Proj_id) as apply_count FROM ProjectList p, MemList m, ProfileList pf WHERE 1=1 AND p.proj_mem_id = m.mem_id AND p.proj_mem_id = pf.profile_mem_id AND p.proj_state = '1' AND p.proj_mem_id = #{projMemId}

SELECT profile_mem_id, mem_sort, mem_idx, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ProjectList WHERE Proj_mem_id=Profile_mem_id AND proj_state = '1') AS proj_add_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ApplyList WHERE Apply_mem_id =Profile_mem_id AND Apply_type = 1) AS applied_count, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SCRAP WHERE MEM_IDX = B.mem_idx) AS scrap_count, (SELECT count(1) FROM ApplyList A, ProjectList B WHERE A.Apply_proj_id =B.PROJ_ID AND B.PROJ_MEM_ID = B.Mem_id AND Apply_type = 2) AS p_Recommand_Count, -- 공급자 제안한 거래 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ApplyList WHERE Apply_mem_id = B.Mem_id AND Apply_type = 2) AS s_Recommand_Count, -- 판매자 제안받은 거래 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ProjectList WHERE Proj_mem_id=Profile_mem_id AND proj_state = '2') AS project_end_count FROM ProfileList A, MemList B WHERE 1=1 AND A.Profile_mem_id =B.Mem_id AND A.Profile_mem_id = #{projMemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCRAP (`MEM_IDX`, `PROJ_IDX`, `FRST_REGIST_MNGR`, `FRST_REGIST_DT`, `LAST_REGIST_MNGR`, `LAST_REGIST_DT`) VALUES (#{memIdx}, #{projIdx}, #{memId}, now(), #{memId}, now());
